creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: purplish grey with white-grey inclusions, with a yellow-green mynah's eye raised above the grinding surface; mynah's eye carved with a petal-like surround with a flame above as if dropping from the sky; grinding surface surrounded by lip dividing it from the lip and forehead which runs off the bottom edge; oval shaped eye has grey centered pupil with a yellow-green concentric layer; underside is flat and undecorated; enclosed in a wooden case with cover
markings: on bottom of box: dealer\'s sticker
title: Duan Inkstone and Case
